title: Bazel Remote Cache "Permission denied" Error on Windows When Renaming Parameter Files

labels.name: team-Remote-Exec
labels.description: Issues and PRs for the Execution (Remote) team

body:
### Description of the bug:


When building with remote cache on Windows with remote_download_toplevel/minimal option, we encounter frequent "Permission denied" errors during file renaming operations. The error specifically occurs when Bazel tries to rename temporary parameter files.
error:

`
ERROR: D:/myworkspace//BUILD.bazel:9:30: Compiling path/to/myfile.cxx failed: Exec failed due to IOException: D:\udu\b\f65vp5rh\execroot\_main\bazel-out\x64_windows-opt\bin\path\to\mylib\_objs\libmylib_base\myfile.obj.params.tmp.3723 -> D:\udu\b\f65vp5rh\execroot\_main\bazel-out\x64_windows-opt\bin\path\to\mylib\_objs\libmylib_base\myfile.obj.params (Permission denied)
`

When checking the build directory after the error, we only find the .obj.params file but not the .tmp.XXXX file mentioned in the error.

`
SUBCOMMAND: # //path/to/mylib:libmylib_base [action 'Compiling path/to/myfile.cxx'...]
cd /d D:/udu/b/f65vp5rh/execroot/_main
  SET BAZEL_DO_NOT_DETECT_CPP_TOOLCHAIN=1
    SET INCLUDE=C:\apps\MVS174\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.29.30133\ATLMFC\include;...
    SET PATH=C:\apps\MVS174\Common7\IDE\\Extensions\Microsoft\IntelliCode\CLI;...
  external\toolchain+\toolchain\x64-windows\14.29.30133\cl.exe @bazel-out/x64_windows-opt/bin/path/to/mylib/_objs/libmylib_base/myfile.obj.params
`


This issue appears consistently on windows builds and makes using remote caching unreliable. We've been examining the source code and suspect the issue occurs in `AbstractActionInputPrefetcher.java` at and around this line:


[AbstractActionInputPrefetcher.java line 624](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/fce5effa85e01fb115b90a6e20881a5b81fa26c7/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/remote/AbstractActionInputPrefetcher.java#L624)


This line attempts to rename a temporary file to its final location, but on Windows this appears to fail with permission denied errors.


My configuration:

windows build environment.
Bazel caching with --remote_cache=grpc://server-name:port
Using --remote_download_toplevel/minimal
